subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: St. John’s Coach Steve Lavin rounded out his staff with the promotions of the assistants Rico Hines and Tony Chiles and the hiring of the former N.B.A. guard Darrick Martin.
snippet: St. John’s Coach Steve Lavin rounded out his staff with the promotions of the assistants Rico Hines and Tony Chiles and the hiring of the former N.B.A. guard Darrick Martin.
